title: Questions found on surveys and forms
context: Ask for standard demographic or background information.

content.bestLine: Can you please provide some background information?

neutral.text: What's your highest level of education?
Can you tell me about your work experience?
How long have you been in this field?

formal.text: Could you provide your date of birth?
What is your current job title?
Can you describe your educational background?
What relevant experience do you have?
What is your expected salary range?

patterns.template: Can you tell me about your [options]?

lines.speaker: Interviewer
lines.text: Can you please provide some background information?

lines.speaker: Candidate
lines.text: Yes, of course. I'm 30 years old, and I have a bachelor's degree in marketing.

lines.speaker: Interviewer
lines.text: That's great. Can you tell me about your work experience?

lines.speaker: Candidate
lines.text: I have about 5 years of experience in the field, and I've been working as a marketing manager for the past 2 years.
